title: Losing Our Humanity…Over and Over 05.26.22
itunes:title: Losing Our Humanity…Over and Over 05.26.22
description:
In episode 1256, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Amy Miller to discuss… Another Mass Shooting, Why The NRA Still Wants To Hold A Convention Right Now, I’m sorry there are HOW MANY varieties of Mtn Dew? And more!

  1. Why The NRA Still Wants To Hold A Convention Right Now
  2. Trump, Cruz scheduled to speak at NRA convention days after Texas shooting
  3. A secret tape made after Columbine shows the NRA's evolution on school shootings
  4. Loaded: how gun manufacturers and the NRA capitalise on tragedy
  5. US reels after massacre in fourth-grade classroom leaves 21 dead

LISTEN: I Was Gonna Fight Fascism (feat. Alabaster dePlume) by Soccer96

Get Amy's Album California King here: blondemedicine.com/bm078-california-king

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
